problem_text: \triangle W X Y and \triangle X Y Z are isosceles and m \angle X Y Z = 128. Find the measure of \angle Y Z X.
compact_text: \triangle WXY and \triangle XYZ are isosceles and m \angle XYZ = 128. Find the measure of \angle YZX.
annotat_text: $ \triangle WXY $  and $ \triangle XYZ $ are isosceles and $m∠XYZ = 128$. Find the measure of $∠YZX$.
